products.name: Burgundy Prom Tuxedo Jacket

products.description: Make a bold statement at prom 2025 with our luxurious burgundy tuxedo jacket. Crafted from premium velvet with contrasting satin peak lapels, this slim-fit jacket embodies modern elegance. The rich burgundy color offers a sophisticated alternative to traditional black, perfect for the fashion-forward gentleman.
